```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```


Loading .csv
```{r}
res_complete <- read.csv("./results_complete.csv")
res_non_complete <- read.csv("./results_non_complete.csv")
```


# Data Manipulation
```{r}
res_C_2_50 <- res_complete[0:49,]
res_C_51_300 <- res_complete[50:299,]
res_C_301_1000 <- res_complete[300:999,]

res_NC_2_50 <- res_non_complete[0:49,]
res_NC_51_300 <- res_non_complete[50:299,]
res_NC_301_1000 <- res_non_complete[300:999,]
```


# Lineplots for Complete Bipartite Graphs
## From 2 up to 50 vertices per part
```{r}
df <- res_2_50
title_vertices <- " for 2 - 50 vertices"
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(Edge.per.part)) +
  xlab("Number of Vertices per part") +
  ylab("Seconds") +
  geom_line(aes(y = Seconds.MWM, colour = "MWM"), size=1, alpha=1, linetype=1) + 
  geom_line(aes(y = Seconds.AU, colour = "AU"), size=1, alpha=1, linetype=1) +
  scale_colour_manual("", 
                      breaks = c("MWM", "AU"),
                      values = c("cornflowerblue", "red")) +
  ggtitle(paste("MWM & AU execution time", title_vertices)) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size=20, hjust = 0.5))
```

```{r}
x <- df$Edge.per.part
y <- (100 - ((100 * df$Total.Cost.AU) / df$Total.Cost.MWM))

ggplot(df, aes(x=x, y=y)) +
  xlab("Number of Vertices per part") +
  ylab("% Difference of Totoal Cost") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(formula=y ~ x, method='loess', se=TRUE, color='forestgreen', size=1.5) +
  ggtitle(paste("% Difference of Totoal Cost", title_vertices)) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size=20, hjust = 0.5))
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x=Edge.per.part, y=Iterations.AU)) +
  xlab("Number of Vertices per part") +
  ylab("Iterations") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method='lm', se=TRUE, color='goldenrod', size=1.5) +
  ggtitle(paste("AU iterations", title_vertices)) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size=20, hjust = 0.5))
```
